search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for AdRoll (adroll.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for AdRoll can be found at the following URL: [https://www.adroll.com/pricing](https://www.adroll.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
### Ads

Pay-as-you-go for display and native ads, but social channels and monthly ad credits will not be available.

_Includes:_

*   Display, native, video & CTV ads
*   Retargeting & prospecting campaigns
*   Audience segmentation & targeting
*   Campaign reporting

### Advanced Package

Our best deal! Get the full AdRoll platform, hundreds or even thousands in free ad credits, guaranteed services, and early product access; when you commit for a year.

_Includes everything in **Ads** plus:_

*   Onboarding services
*   Account management services
*   Creative services
*   Optimization & policy services
*   24/7 customer support

[![Image 1: AdRoll logo. ](https://www.adroll.com/assets/svg/logo-adroll.svg)](https://www.adroll.com/)

Compare Plans
-------------

### Ads

### Advanced Package

Compare Plans
-------------

### Ads

### Advanced Package

#### Ad Channels

Retargeting Campaigns

Remarket to people who have previously interacted with your brand, product or service. Convert and grow customers loyalty and increase life-time value.

Brand Awareness Campaigns

Generate awareness and grow quality traffic to your site, app or store. Refill your marketing funnel by reaching across the web to insert your brand/product/service into the consideration set of people who are entering, or are in a buy cycle.

Display Ads

Capture attention by prominently displaying an image (along with a headline, text and call-to-action). HTML5 ads stand-out by introducing movement and sound into engaging ads that utilize a combination of animations, videos, imagery and/or audio.

Connected TV Ads

Capture attention and deepen connections with full-screen, non-skippable TV ads in premium streaming programming. - delivered to internet-connect TVs.

Video Ads

Leverage video ad placements across the open-web to convey a lot of information in a short amount of time.

Native Ads

Where display ads are designed to stand-out, native ads offer a softer selling approach with a look and feel that blends into the editorial content on a site or app.

Dynamic Ads

Reflecting an individual’s personalized journey, dynamic ads incorporate images of previously viewed products, top products, or recommended products.

#### Audience & Segmentation

Unified Contacts (Anonymous and Identified)

AdRoll Unified Contacts makes it easy to integrate any existing customer database, add to it by easily defining characteristics of new contacts you want, and then manage them all in one place.

Advanced List Building

Using the list builder functionality, you can create defined segments based on your contacts’ attributes and behaviors using multiple criteria, from products and pages viewed to emails they have opened.

#### Monthly Recurring Ad Credits!

A credit to your account, every single month, to spend on web ads

AdRoll ad credits give you dedicated funds to use towards advertising — all included in your package!

#### Analytics

Benchmarking

Compare your CTR, CPC & CPM against the average ranges of other advertisers within your industry peer group. This data can help give you a deeper sense of performance past just the raw numbers.

Ad Campaign Reporting

Select the conversion segments you'd like to analyze, your preferred attribution model, and the date range you'd like to view. AdRoll then breaks down your data across channels and by each individual campaign.

New Visitor Insights

Optimize across channels based on buyer behavior and learn how customers see you and your products.

Scheduled/Exportable Reporting

Set your report frequency to daily, weekly, or monthly and select recipients for your reports or export the data for other purposes at any time.

Tracked Conversions

Define what a conversion means to you — maybe it's completing a purchase, submitting a form, or downloading a piece of content.

Revenue Tracking

Create custom conversion variables to specify the revenue attributed to your tracked conversions or a sale.

Recipe & Email Reporting

Track campaign performance across audiences and attribute success to the right channels and tactics, across all your cross-channel campaigns.

#### Cross-Channel Attribution

UTM-Tracked Reporting

A deduplicated view of traffic sources, revenue, conversions, average order value, and campaign performance.

Integrated Platform Reporting  
(ads, email, SMS, ecommerce store/CRM/Google Analytics)

Eliminate manual work by viewing and analyzing your campaign performance via API-integrated ads, email, and SMS channels. Compare against imported conversions and revenue metrics from your trusted source: ecommerce store, CRM, or Google Analytics.

Add-on

Insights (UTM only)

At-a-glance and real-time insights into your top-performing channels and campaigns via UTM-tracked reporting.

Insights (UTM & Integrations)

At-a-glance and real-time insights into your top-performing channels and campaigns viaUTM-tracked reporting and API-integrated ads, email, and SMS platforms.

Add-on

Attributed Conversions Analysis (UTM only)

Better understand the true contribution of each channel and inform budget allocation decisions with trusted, industry-standard, and deduplicated UTM tracking for conversions and revenue.

Attributed Conversions Analysis (UTM & Integrations)

One dashboard to compare and contrast conversion, revenue, and spend metrics reported by your integrated ads, email, and SMS platforms as well as reporting from your deduplicated UTM tracking. No manual exports or switching between platforms.

Add-on

Pathways Analysis

Combine UTM-tagged marketing activities with your AdRoll campaigns to capture all the different touchpoints on your customer's path to conversion.

Assisted Conversions Analysis

A more holistic picture of a channel's attribution influence. See the number of conversions (as well as the coinciding revenue) for converters that the channel served ads to, but did not receive the attribution credit based on the selected attribution model.

#### Integrations

Shopify Store

Leverage data from your Shopify store to optimize ad campaigns, launch dynamic creative, and grow revenue.

Shopify Plus Store

Leverage data from your Shopify store to optimize ad campaigns, launch dynamic creative, and grow revenue.

WooCommerce Store

Leverage data from your WooCommerce store to optimize ad campaigns, launch dynamic creative, and grow revenue.

Wix Store

Leverage data from your Wix store to optimize ad campaigns, find your best customers, and grow revenue.

BigCommerce Store

Leverage data from your BigCommerce store to optimize ad campaigns, find your best customers, and grow revenue.

Klaviyo Audiences

Use the power of first-party data to dynamically target your subscribers with relevant web ads. Sync your Klaviyo lists and segments to boost ROAS by personalizing your campaigns and automatically keeping your audiences up to date.

Facebook Ad Campaigns (Create & Edit)

Connect your Facebook advertising accounts to create new social ad campaigns and to edit campaigns you created in Facebook.

Instagram Ad Campaigns (Create & Edit)

Connect your Instagram advertising accounts to create social ad campaigns and to edit campaigns you created in Instagram.

TikTok Ad Campaigns (Create & Edit)

Connect your TikTok advertising accounts to create social ad campaigns and to edit the campaigns you created in TikTok Ads Manager.

Pinterest Ad Campaigns (Create & Edit)

Connect your Pinterest advertising accounts to create social ad campaigns and to edit the campaigns you created in Pinterest Ads Manager.

Ads Reporting Integrations (Amazon, Bing, Facebook,  
Instagram, Google Ads, LinkedIn, TikTok, Pinterest, Snapchat, X/Twitter)

Hourly import of dozens of metrics from your API-integrated ads channels for analysis and cross-channel attribution.

Add-on

Email Reporting Integrations (Klaviyo, MailChimp, Active Campaign)

Hourly import of dozens of metrics from your API-integrated email channels for analysis and cross-channel attribution.

Add-on

SMS Reporting Integrations (Klaviyo)

Hourly import of dozens of metrics from your API-integrated SMS channels for analysis and cross-channel attribution.

Add-on

Trusted Source Reporting Integrations  
(Shopify, WooCommerce, Salesforce, Hubspot or Google Analytics)

Hourly import of conversion and revenue metrics from your ecommerce store, CRM, or Google Analytics for analysis and cross-channel attribution.

Add-on

#### Automation Builder

Strategic Marketing Recipes

Choose from best-practice, templated strategies that help you achieve your goals.

Web Channels in Marketing Recipes

Seamlessly coordinate display, native, and video ads to send customized messages at any point in the customer journey.

Connected Social Channels in Marketing Recipes

Create and launch a single, cross-channel campaign that splits or allocates your budget across TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest.

Configurable Campaign Reporting

Analyze campaign, channel and asset performance in one place to get a fast and effective view of what’s working and what’s not to inform quick, smart changes.

#### Support

Customer Support

Access a plethora of video and written resources such as how-to’s, blogs, and help center articles, along with live agent support accessible by email and phone.

#### Services

Creative Services

Make the AdRoll team of creative experts an extension of your own: receive consultations with design experts, consistent ad creative refreshes, and bespoke production of specialty ads.

Guaranteed Onboarding Services

After selecting Advanced Package, receive a white glove experience from your Dedicated Onboarding Specialist for hands-on help with to complete your technical implementation.

Dedicated Account Management

Gain unfettered access to a dedicated point of contact for all your needs, including support for strategic analysis, insights, and recommendations.

Quarterly Business Reviews

Check in with your dedicated AdRoll account team each quarter to discuss updates, strategize, and deep dive into performance metrics for ad types, audience, devices, and more.

Advanced Optimization Services

Work with our team to fine-tune your campaigns with insights and analytics support including frequency and reach analysis, user engagement, along with quarterly performance deep dives around strategy, ad types, audience, devices, etc.

View All Features

![Image 2](https://www.adroll.com/assets/img/homepage/logo-volcanica.png?format=png&auto=webp)

“Since last year, **our revenue has increased 191%**, **our attributed conversions 177%**, and **our engagement 33%** \[with AdRoll\]. We’re reaching and converting customers higher in the funnel.”

FAQs
----

#### What are ad credits?

AdRoll uses “ad credits” as a means of distributing funds that customers can use on advertising inside the AdRoll platform. An ad credit is quite literally us crediting your account with funds to use on ads. For more information, please visit our [Ad Credits Guide](https://help.adroll.com/hc/en-us/articles/5571810760461-Ad-Credits-Guide).

#### Are there limitations on how the ad credits can be used?

Different ad credits can be used in slightly different ways. Please visit our [Ad Credits Guide](https://help.adroll.com/hc/en-us/articles/5571810760461-Ad-Credits-Guide) to see full details.

#### I’m an agency that wants to work with AdRoll. How do I get started?

Glad you’re here! A lot of agencies use and love AdRoll. We actually have a dedicated team to help agencies work with AdRoll. Please visit our [agency partnerships page](https://www.adroll.com/agency) to request a meeting.

#### How much does it cost to run an Ads package campaign?

AdRoll requires a minimum daily spend of $5 and a minimum daily budget of $10 to launch a campaign. [Click here](https://help.adroll.com/hc/en-us/articles/212676017-Budget-and-Spend) to find more information on budget and spend in the AdRoll platform.

#### How is pricing determined?

AdRoll offers dynamic pricing based on CPM (cost per thousand impressions), which means the cost can vary depending on demand. Checkout our [detailed documentation](https://help.adroll.com/hc/en-us/articles/212012278-Benefits-of-Dynamic-CPM-Pricing) for more information on our dynamic CPM pricing.

Get free marketing tools, and see pricing for AdRoll\'s growth marketing automation platform, helping D2C ecommerce brands grow with brand awareness, retargeting, email, and onsite personalization.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: AdRoll offers dynamic pricing based on CPM (cost per thousand impressions), with a minimum daily spend of $5 and a minimum daily budget of $10.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Pay-as-you-go for display and native ads, but social channels and monthly ad credits will not be available.
